docs.text: it is hard to imagine that a movie which includes abortion and incest as prominent plot devices could be so sensitive , so delicate , so insightful and yes , even so enjoyable .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: somehow , the cider house rules manages to keep an even keel in the face of the harsh subject matter and allows a substantial amount of heart to shine through .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: set in the 1940's , the film tells the story of a unique young man named homer wells ( tobey maguire , ride with the devil ) .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: an orphan , twice rejected as an infant by possible adoptive parents , he grows up in the care and under the tutelage of dr . wilbur larch ( michael caine , little voice ) , father figure to the orphans of st . cloud , obstetrician or abortionist to the unhappily pregnant women who come there seeking his help .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: figuring that as long as homer was going to stay at the orphanage , he might as well be of use , dr . larch begins teaching him all he knows about obstetrics .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: soon homer is delivering babies like a professional .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: he refuses to perform abortions , instead wondering why the couples just didn't behave more responsibly .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: larch , too old and experienced to have such youthful ideals , marvels that homer " continues to have such high expectations of people . "
docs.label: positive

docs.text: such is the result of an insulated upbringing .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: though skilled in certain medical procedures , homer remains woefully naive and ignorant about most everything else .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: he finally figures that in order to find his place in the world , he must go out into it .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: befriending a young couple who had come to see dr . larch , he hitches a ride with them and parlays that into landing a job as an apple picker with a group of black migrant workers at the orchard where they lived .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: thus , homer begins his worldly instruction , with new friend candy kendall ( charlize theron , the astronaut's wife ) a willing tutor .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: tobey maguire is well cast yet again as an inherently good man who is seeking answers to life's questions . . .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: many of which he was unaware needed to be asked .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: he demonstrates a quiet strength and thoughtful curiosity that is both warm and appealing .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: michael caine is , in a word , brilliant as the caring caretaker of these orphans , many of whom he helped to bring into the world .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: calling them " princes of maine , kings of new england " in his ritualistic goodnight , mr . caine manages to communicate the love and commitment larch has towards these children without becoming maudlin or saccharine .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: delroy lindo ( a life less ordinary ) has many powerful moments as mr . rose , the strong and charismatic leader of the apple pickers whom homer joins .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: director lasse hallstrom ( what's eating gilbert grape ? ) and screenwriter/novelist john irving ( the world according to garp ) , who adapted his own work for this movie deserve much of the credit for the balanced approach to the sensitive subject matter .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: regardless of one's personal stand on the divisive matter of abortion , it is hard to imagine anyone becoming offended by the evenhanded treatment used by these filmmakers .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the title is a reference to a list of rules posted in the quarters of the illiterate apple pickers .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: figuring the rules didn't apply to them since they didn't have a hand in writing them , they decide to ignore the list and make up their own rules as they go along .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: dr . larch , in his own way , acts similarly .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: there is a danger in that line of reasoning .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: god has also given us a set of rules .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: unlike the list posted in the cider house , god's rules , if followed , promise us benefits beyond our imagination .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: and yet , many continue to ignore his " rules " preferring to make up their own as they go through life .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: " trust in the lord with all thine heart ; and lean not unto thine own understanding . "
docs.label: positive

docs.text: proverbs 3 : 5 [kjv]
docs.label: positive

docs.text: just as a builder follows a designer's blueprint or a conductor follows a composer's score , why shouldn't we follow the rules of life given to us by life's architect for our own blessing ?
docs.label: positive
